answers.answer: If you should carry on, with what?  Fasting?Nausea, dizziness and headache could be caused by having too low blood sugar, which could be a result of fasting, particularly, if you have any type of blood sugar disorder, such as diabetes or hypoglycemia.Your belief will determine whether or not you must continue fasting.

I believe you should not continue.I have heard within Islam it is advisable that a person not fast if they have a medical issue which means they cant.It isn't a sign of spiritual weakness, you just cannot do it.
